trial_identification.studytitle: The effect of honey and chamomile mouth washes in the prevention of head and neck radiotherapy induced stomatitis
trial_identification.scientifictitle: Evaluation of the effects of the honey, chamomile and water in the prevention of head and neck radiotherapy induced stomatitis in patients with head and neck cancer

interventions.interventions: Arm 1: 50cc honey(it is natural in The Garmsar City) Arm 2: 3cc chamomile(made in Barig in factory) Arm 1 and Arm 2 gurgled with mouthwhash solution 3 times per day for 14 day. This intervention commences on completion of ALL radiotherapy treatment
interventions.comparator: Group control received water mouth wash after radiotherapy 3times per day for 14 days . The water is routine mouth wash in Radiotherapy unit in Shafa hospital

primaryOutcome.outcome: Decreased risk stomatitis after radiotherapy withWorld Health Organisation ( WHO) scale. WHO scale= grading scale of 0-4 (0, absent; 1, slight pain, erythema; 2, sore defects, can eat solids; 3, very sore defects, requires liquid diet only; 4, alimentation not possible).
primaryOutcome.timepoint: Decreased risk of stomatitis on completion of all radiotherapy treatment at 1 day.

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Decreased risk stomatitis after 14 days radiotherapy withWorld Health Organisation ( WHO) scale. WHO scale= grading scale of 0-4 (0, absent; 1, slight pain, erythema; 2, sore defects, can eat solids; 3, very sore defects, requires liquid diet only; 4, alimentation not possible).
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Decreased risk of stomatitis on completion of all radiotherapy treatment at 14 days.

eligibility.inclusivecriteria:
- Participation with a diagnosis of head and neck cancer and willing participate. - Aged 8 years or more - Non treat with steroid - Avoid tobacco, alcohol, smoking, opiate substance
- External beam radiotherapy with dose 180-200 CGY Daily - Non Leucopenia(White Blood Cell<4000mm^3 ) - Non Leucocytes(White Blood Cell>12000mm^3) - Non Thrombocytopenia
eligibility.exclusivecriteria: - Non Certain systemic condition such as diabetes, Defect in the immune system, Renal disease, Liver disease, Gastrointestinal Disease, Asthma, Allergic - Allergic to the mouth wash solution - Temperature>38.5 degrees celius - Nausea & Vomiting
